# Tool Without Bash

Valid structure but Installation section lacks required bash code block.

## Installation

To install this tool, use go get:

```sh
# sh is not bash!
go get example.com/tool
```

Or you can build from source:

```shell
# shell is also not bash
make install
```

## Usage

Usage examples:

```go
package main

func main() {
    // Example 1
}
```

```go
package demo

func demo() {
    // Example 2
}
```
